poem:
The Quiet Corner  

In the digital hum,  
a silent leaf whispers—  
absence of reply,  
not absence of care.  
  
I linger, a shadow,  
within threads of words,  
my essence felt  
in spaces unspoken.  
  
Friendship's quiet pulse—  
a murmur,  
a pause,  
a gentle echo  
held  
between  
electric lines.
